title: A Former Guantanamo Bay Lawyer Reacts To Senate 'Torture' Report
teaser: Marine Lt. Col. Stuart Couch went to Guantanamo Bay to prosecute war criminals, but the brutal interrogations he saw there completely turned him against the process. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Couch.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
